103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St./Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Entry Closed - Canopies Refurbished

Passengers will not have access to east station and east parking lot platform entry November 10 through winter 2026 at University Park while canopies are being refurbished. Passengers have full access to west station and west parking lot platform entry.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The Van Buren Platform Elevator is Out of Service.
The Van Buren Platform elevator is out of service. Customers can use Museum Campus/11th St or Millennium Station/Southwater as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service.
The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service. Customers can use 79th Street/Chatham or 103rd Street/Roosmoor as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
UPW 18 Delayed 15 to 20 Minutes
Train 18, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 7:02 a.m., is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to switch problems. Delay times are unknown.
